SalaryPage.title: {occupation} Salary in {area}
SalaryPage.description: Official H1B prevailing wage data for {occupation} (SOC {code}) in the {area} metropolitan area.
SalaryPage.detailed_desc: Breakdown of hourly and annual prevailing wages for all experience levels.
SalaryPage.no_data: No specific wage data available for this combination.
SalaryPage.footer_desc: Search our complete database of 850+ occupations across 2,600+ US locations.

ChatWidget.disclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Check important info.

Welcome.title: Welcome to H1B Wage Visualizer
Welcome.description: Discover H1B wage data insights across the US. Compare salaries, explore locations, and find the best city for your career.

Tour.search_desc: Start by searching for your job title or SOC code (e.g., 'Software Developer').
Tour.filters_desc: Search for an occupation and filter by location or city tier.
Tour.compare_desc: Select multiple locations to compare side-by-side or share a report.
Tour.map_desc: Explore wages geographically. Filters help you find the best locations.
Tour.wages_desc: View detailed wage breakdowns by level and city tier.
Tour.chat_desc: Got questions? Ask our AI assistant for specific insights.

Metrics.page_subtitle: Monitor visits, chat usage, and token spend in real time.
Metrics.kv_warning: Redis credentials are not configured. Metrics will remain at zero until KV_REST_API_URL and KV_REST_API_TOKEN are set.
Metrics.table_subtitle: Hashed visitor IDs with visits, chat counts, and token usage.
Metrics.empty_state: No visitor data yet. Chat with the assistant or load the map to start collecting metrics.
